Key Match Events: Detroit Tigers beat the White Sox to clinch a playoff spot for the first time in a decade
The Tigers improved to 86-74 and ensured that, at the very least, they will have the third and final wild card spot
Post-Match Reflections: The last 10 years have been tough to watch
The Tigers have ended their playoff drought
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Comerica Park
The Tigers have won 31-11 since Aug. 10
Others: The Tigers were 0.2% to make the playoffs six weeks ago
The Tigers were eight games below.500 on Aug. 11
The Tigers have a 3.1% chance to make the playoffs as of Sept. 27
